content: in this legal case a court in bologna has made a final ruling regarding the division of an inheritance between two siblings referred to as wm and mk the court has determined the value of the assets in the estate including real estate properties furniture bank deposits and securities they have also considered any donations made by the parents to the siblings and have ordered certain assets to be assigned to each sibling the defendant has been ordered to reimburse the plaintiff for the costs of the litigation the court has cited relevant articles of the civil code and the civil procedure code and discussed the procedural history of the case they have concluded that the assets should be divided according to a specific plan considering collation of donations and the preferences expressed by the siblings the court has also determined the costs of the litigation and ordered the defendant to pay a portion of these costs the ruling includes transferring a certain amount of money to the parents of wm and assigning movable and immovable assets to wm and mk based on an experts schedule the defendant is responsible for reimbursing the plaintiff for litigation costs and both parties must jointly and severally pay the costs of the expert reports the ruling was made by a judge on september 18 2023 in bologna
